strategy_reasoning: Using a 'Retro Game Patch Notes' metaphor fits the technical nature of the updates (cache removal, new models, deployment guides) while maintaining the cozy, non-intimidating brand voice. The pixel art style softens the 'hard tech' of RTX 5090s and API refactors into something nostalgic and warm, inviting engagement from both devs and casual creators.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a vintage computer monitor sitting in a lush digital garden. Screen glowing with text 'PATCH NOTES'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky pixels, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. 8-bit flowers blooming around the screen. Like Stardew Valley meets coding. Emotionally warm, nostalgic.
images.description: Cover image establishing the cozy 'digital garden' update theme.

images.prompt: Retro 8-bit pixel art RPG inventory screen. Two glowing new item slots unlocked. Item 1: A pixelated robot eye labeled 'Kimi K2.5'. Item 2: A pixelated magnifying glass labeled 'Web Research'. Soft pastel mint and peach gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting. Cozy gaming interface vibes like Unpacking. Lime green accents.
images.description: Visualizing the new AI model capabilities as unlockable game items.

images.prompt: Cozy pixel art illustration of a chunky 'RTX 5090' graphics card sitting on a wooden desk next to a pixelated coffee mug and a 'Speed Up' arrow icon. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and lavender ambient lighting. 8-bit aesthetic, warm and nostalgic. Represents new deployment guides and faster API calls.
images.description: Representing the hardware guides and cache removal as a cozy workspace upgrade.
